channel.title: Jagex updated classic
channel.description:
Well, I logged into classic for fun today.
I noticed they updated it....
You can now chat to people on RS2 etc etc
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/29aqmg9.jpg[/img]

item.title: Jagex updated classic
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:8, topic:308630”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=405060.msg3000403#msg3000403 date=1255927622]
Its always been that way, and no its not for new rsc shit.
[/quote]
no, they took it out.[/quote]

I never noticed, maybe they just decided to flip out the clients instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex updated classic
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:8, topic:308630”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=405060.msg3000403#msg3000403 date=1255927622]
Its always been that way, and no its not for new rsc shit.
[/quote]
no, they took it out.[/quote]
I suppose that makes sense, given that their goal when they locked people out of further usage of RSC was to detach the two games, in a way.
I do remember logging into RSC years ago on my first account for shits and giggles, while still maintaining the ability to communicate with people playing RS2.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex updated classic
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:5, topic:308630”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=405060.msg2995576#msg2995576 date=1255562180]
Well, I logged into classic for fun today.

I noticed they updated it…

You can now chat to people on RS2 etc etc[/quote]

You could talk to people on rs2 when you could play rsc(provided your account was made before x and you had members).[/quote]Actually it wasn’t if “your account was made before x”, it was if you logged in within the last 6 months before classic turned into members only. I would have liked it to ideally be what you thought it was -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex updated classic
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:1, topic:308630”]Well, I logged into classic for fun today.

I noticed they updated it…

You can now chat to people on RS2 etc etc[/quote]

You could talk to people on rs2 when you could play rsc(provided your account was made before x and you had members).

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex updated classic
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Erj:

Wasn’t this implemented years ago? I could of swore they did.

yeah they had to stop it because they updated the filter on rs2, they said it would be seperate for good, looks like they are getting ready to re-release rsc with the new plan!

Read full topic
